dmca.title: Wisegeek.com complains to Google about copying
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

It has come to our attention that our copyrighted content located at http://www.wisegeek.com is being copied at http://www.themedicalencyelopedia.com, a website that Google links to from search results pages. To comply with the Digital Millennium Copyright Act (DMCA), we request that you stop linking to any of the pages at http://www.themedicalencyclopedia.com.

Section 1: Copyrighted Material

The text and images from the infringing site are direct copies of the text and images from our site. Although there is not a direct correlation between the images on a particular page on their site to a particular page on our site, all of their images were stolen from http://www.wisegeek.com. Here are three examples of the copyrighted text:

www.wisegeek.com/how-can-i-minimize-tooth-plaque.htm http://www.wisegeek.com/what-is-porcelain-gallbladder.htm www.wisegeek.com/is-vasectomy-reversal-possible.htm

Section 2: Search Results Linking to Infringing Material

Here are three examples of Google searches that result in links to the infringing website:

Search Query:	"Minimize Tooth Plaque"
Infringing Web Page: http://www.google.com/search?h1=en&1r=&q=%22Minimize+Tooth+ Plaque%22&btnG
